name: 后遗症／Sequela
description:
A chid who suffers from mental illness has killed his family, so he goes to his own dream with the help of a psychiatrist, tries to face his sequelae by looking for the missing memory and personality...
Because of his spiritual world was polluted, so his dream becomes very dangerous, the "Shadow" in each dream also become his enemy, he needs to constantly explore everythings in the dream, and escape the attack of these "enemies", until he finds the truth of his crime, and be able to overcome his own illness.

◆Pixel game graphics and weird sounds.
◆Some hidden items need to be found carefully.
◆Many fun and difficult puzzles.
◆Many different types of enemies, but you can only try your best to avoid them.
◆A realistic story wrapped in fantasy. All the characters' experiences come from our ordinary life.

This game contains some horror elements.
